view more Attractions
Bangkok
remove_red_eye

Bangkok

keyboard_arrow_right

There are a great variety of tourist places in Bangkok, mostly historical attractions and temples with elaborate architecture and art. Famous temples are Wat Phra Kaew, Wat Pho, Wat Arun, Wat Phu Khao Thong, Wat Ratchanadda, Wat Traimit, Wat Benchamabophit Bangkok nightlife is another highlight that has attracted many of tourists from all over the world.

Where to go
Temple
Royal Palace
Historical
Shopping
Park
Capital
Destination
The Grand Palace

Located at the heart of Bangkok, Thailand.

King Prajadhipok Museum

is situated in the area of the Department of Public Works and Town & Country Planning Building at the Parn Fah Leelad Bridge.

The Queen’s Gallery

displayed the work of Thai artists, especially the new Thai artists whose works have not been known by the society
